title: CIC-Tour Féminin Pyrénées director calls riders ‘spoiled children’ after UCI cancels race
content:
Race cancelation highlights disparities within the peloton as well as challenges for organizers as sport grows rapidly.

Read the full article at CIC-Tour Féminin Pyrénées director calls riders ‘spoiled children’ after UCI cancels race on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
